itunes:title: John Week 5 with Raechel Myers
title: John Week 5 with Raechel Myers
description:
On this week’s podcast, Amanda is excited for Raechel’s return! Instead of co-hosting this time, Raechel sits in the guest’s chair as the pair talk through the last chapters of John. Together they follow Jesus from His prayer for all believers to the foot of the cross to the days following His glorious resurrection. Join them as they reflect on how Jesus’s priceless sacrifice has changed everything for us.


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 5 of the She Reads Truth John reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the John collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/john-week-5-with-raechel-myers
